original_text: You should not speak like that! It seems that you are breaking Christ into several parts. I, Paul, did not die on a cross to save you. When they baptized you, it was not on my behalf.
korean_text: 그리스도께서 어찌 나뉘었느냐 바울이 너희를 위하여 십자가에 못 박혔으며 바울의 이름으로 너희가 세례를 받았느냐

sentences.original_text: You should not speak like that!
you are breaking Christ into several parts
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 그리스도를 여러 부분으로 나누고 있다

sentences.original_text: did not die on a cross to save you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희를 구원하기 위해 십자가에서 죽지 않았다

sentences.original_text: it was not on my behalf
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 나를 위해 한 것이 아니었다
